info.title: DF: Asset Management
info.description:
Has accountability for:
- managing Assets in data zone
	- creating data brew jobs for profiling and data conversion 
	- running data bre job for profiling and data quality

hubExecutionArn.description: The hub execution id of the state machine

spokeExecutionArn.description: The Spoke execution id of the state machine

jobRunStatus.description: The run status of the job

jobStartTime.description: The start time of the last job run

columns.description: column profiles that are to be added to our asset.
